sentences.en: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.cn: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.en: "Could I have a word?" — "Oh dear, if you must."
sentences.cn: “我能说一句吗？”——“亲爱的，如果你非说不可的话，好吧。”

sentences.en: "They don't say a single word to each other."—"How come?"
sentences.cn: “他们相互之间一句话都不说。”——“怎么会这样呢？”

sentences.en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
sentences.cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

sentences.en: Friends passed the word that the miners wanted to see him.
sentences.cn: 朋友们传话说矿工们想见他。

sentences.en: going around by the road was too tedious for words.
sentences.cn: 绕着路走上一圈真是乏味。

sentences.en: he felt a vague disappointment which he couldn't put into words.
sentences.cn: 他感到些许无法用言语表达的失望之情。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: I think it's time you had a word with him.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你该跟他谈谈了。

sentences.en: I wonder if I might have a word with Mr Abbot?
sentences.cn: 请问我能否和阿博特先生说几句话？

sentences.en: I'll just &B{have a word with} him.
sentences.cn: 我只想和他说一两句话。

sentences.en: my word, you were here quickly!.
sentences.cn: 说真的，你到这儿真快！。

sentences.en: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.cn: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

sentences.en: Politicians have debased the meaning of the word "freedom"
sentences.cn: 政客们贬低了“自由”一词的意义。

sentences.en: She does like to have the last word in any discussion.
sentences.cn: 她确实喜欢商量什么事都最终自己说了算。

sentences.en: So many people think feminism is a dirty word.
sentences.cn: 这么多人都认为女权主义是个龌龊的字眼。

sentences.en: The final word will still come from the Secretary of State.
sentences.cn: 最后仍然要由国务卿来定夺。

sentences.en: The spa is the last word in luxury and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 这家矿泉疗养浴场极尽奢华，功效极高。

sentences.en: Well, I'll take your word for it then, love.
sentences.cn: 唔，那我就信你吧，亲爱的。

sentences.en: What does that word mean?
sentences.cn: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.en: Word has been spreading fast of the incidents on the streets.
sentences.cn: 有关街头骚乱的消息迅速传播开来。

sentences.en: Word went out that a column of tanks was on its way.
sentences.cn: 有消息说一队坦克已经出动了。

sentences.en: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.cn: 写一篇约500字的文章。

words.tran_cn: 用词语表达；讲话（word的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 我敢保证；说实在话（表示惊讶或强调）
守信的人，遵守诺言的人

phrases.phrase: be as good as one's word

phrases.tran_cn: 好听的话，赞扬的话，恭维话；有意和解的话

phrases.phrase: have a word in someone's ear
phrases.tran_cn: 和某人咬耳朵；和某人私下谈；私下警告某人
与……谈几句话，和……谈一谈；与...商谈
最后一句话；最后决定权；最新成果；最新形式
相信某人说的话是真的

phrases.phrase: take the words out of someone's mouth

phrases.tran_cn: 一句话也没说；一声不吭
n. 构词，构词法；词性转换
n. 文字处理机；文字处理软件

trans.tran_cn: 单词，字，话（语），歌词，诺言，消息，命令，短时间的谈话
trans.tran_en: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something
